title: fusedfolio
author: fusedfolio
content: I would like to inform you all that a native app for FusedFolio is available for Android and Windows.The Android app can be downloaded from https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.fusedfolio.appAnd the Windows app can be downloaded using the following link: https[Suspicious link removed]I am attaching a few screenshots from the Android app.Comments and suggestions are appreciated!https://www.fusedfolio.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/mobile-1.jpghttps://www.fusedfolio.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/mobile-2.jpghttps://www.fusedfolio.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/mobile-3.jpghttps://www.fusedfolio.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/mobile-4.jpghttps://www.fusedfolio.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/mobile-5.jpghttps://www.fusedfolio.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/mobile-6.jpghttps://www.fusedfolio.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/mobile-7.jpghttps://www.fusedfolio.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/mobile-8.jpg
